Name: Frequency of Staten Island ferry service.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the frequency of Staten Island ferry service.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Transportation
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Paragraphs (iii) and (iv) of subdivision a of section 19-305 of the administrative code of the city of New York are amended to read as follows:
(iii) On Saturdays, except on legal holidays, service both to and from Manhattan’s Whitehall terminal and Staten Island’s St. George terminal shall be every hour except between the hours of 6:00 a.m. and [7:00 p.m.] 12:00 a.m., in which case service shall be every thirty minutes.
(iv) On Sundays, except on legal holidays, service both to and from Manhattan’s Whitehall terminal and Staten Island’s St. George terminal shall be every hour except between the hours of 12:00 a.m. and 1:00 a.m., and between the hours of 9:00 a.m. and [7:00 p.m.] 12:00 a.m., in which case service shall be every thirty minutes.
§ 2.  This local law shall take effect thirty days after it is enacted.

PH
LS # 2953
5.24.07 -  1 p.m.
